abbot.script

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • abbot.script.Step
      • abbot.script.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XMLConstants, XMLifiable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Event
extends Step
    Script step to generate a single AWT event to a component. Currently used for key down/up and mouse motion.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
